Add:
wire   intoggle;
   wire   insync;
   pulse2toggle    pulse2toggle(
				.out		(intoggle),
				.clk		(inclk),
				.in		(in),
				.reset		(reset));
   synchronizer #(1) synchronizer(
				  .out			(insync),
				  .in			(intoggle),
				  .clk			(outclk),
				  .reset		(reset));
   toggle2pulse toggle2pulse(
			     .out		(out),
			     .clk		(outclk),
			     .in		(insync),
			     .reset		(reset));
